There are 3 levels to this game: Easy, Medium and Hard.

As you progress from easy to hard level, the board gets larger and the words get tougher.



The Easy level contains a 10 by 10 puzzle which will require you to find at the most 7 words.
This means that IF you get LUCKY, you can find less words in the puzzle! The Medium level contains a 12 by 12 puzzle which will require you to find at the most 5 words.
This means that IF you get LUCKY, you can find less words in the puzzle! The Hard level contains a 14 by 14 puzzle which will require you to find at the most 5 hard words.
This means that IF you get LUCKY, you can find less words in the puzzle!
